description: Provides the sending limits for the Amazon SES account.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: The GetSendQuota API call can be used to determine the current email sending limits of an account, which is a form of system information that could help an adversary understand the operational capabilities of the target environment.
By using GetSendQuota, an attacker could gather details about the SES service's capacity and limitations, which is part of understanding the victim's resources.
This API call allows adversaries to discover details about the cloud services in use (SES in this case), contributing to broader cloud service reconnaissance.
